Forward KL Loss

forward_kl_loss.Rd

Compute the forward KL loss for a flow model.

Usage

forward_kl_loss(input)

Arguments

input

The output of the flow model, which should be a tensor of dimensions [batch1, ..., batchN, d] where batch1, ..., batchN are the dimensions of the batch and d is the dimension of the input. It must also have an attribute log_jacobian containing the log determinant of the Jacobian of the transformation.

Examples

library(torch)
flow_model <- nn_sequential_conditional_flow(
  nn_affine_coupling_block(2, 0),
  nn_permutation_flow(2),
  nn_affine_coupling_block(2, 0)
)
x <- torch_randn(10, 2)
y <- flow_model(x)
loss <- forward_kl_loss(y)
